subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The junior Dwayne Anderson, making the first start of his career, hit a 3-pointer from the left corner with 12 seconds remaining Saturday to give Villanova a 72-70 victory against visiting Seton Hall.
snippet: The junior Dwayne Anderson, making the first start of his career, hit a 3-pointer from the left corner with 12 seconds remaining Saturday to give Villanova a 72-70 victory against visiting Seton Hall.
